name: Prophecy of Submersion
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Mona, equip this card.
When Mona equips this card, immediately use Stellaris Phantasm once.
When your Mona, who has this card equipped, is the active character, the Hydro-Related Reactions you trigger deal +2 additional DMG.
(You must have Mona in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1203]</color>, equip this card.
When $[A1203] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S12033]</color> once.
When your $[A1203], who has this card equipped, is the active character, the $[K212] you trigger deal +2 additional DMG.
(You must have $[A1203] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Mona</color>, equip this card.
When Mona equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Stellaris Phantasm</color> once.
When your Mona, who has this card equipped, is the active character, the <color=#80C0FFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}Hydro-Related Reactions</color> you trigger deal +2 additional DMG.
(You must have Mona in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext:
"Hey! You should be playing that card!"
"...Well, alright then, do what you want."
source: Reward for inviting Mona to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
